description: An outstanding 1982 Corvette Collector's Edition with 21,000 miles. The Collector's Edition commemorated the end of C3 production which had an incredibly successful run from 1968-1982! It was the first Corvette to surpass the $20,000 price threshold and it has many unique features that were not available on standard production Corvettes. The following items are all unique to the Collector's Edition: special Silver Beige metallic paint, special pinstripes and fade out graphics, special bronze tinted glass tops & emblems, unique opening hatchback rear window, unique turbine aluminum wheels and a custom tri-tone bronze leather interior. The Collector's Edition also came with nearly all regular production options as standard equipment. Too often special edition models consist of a few decals and a name plate but Chevrolet went all out to bid farewell to the C3 with the 1982 Collectors's Edition. A lot of car for $26,500! Call Tom or Dave at (407) 428-0117 for details.

description: 1982 Chevrolet CorvetteThis low mileage 1982 Chevrolet Corvette model has been kept in a Garage space when not in use and has not been driven in the Winter Season since owned! The Corvette has been a great driver as well! Like most other Corvette models of this Vintage the Air Conditioner unit does not work. Unlike most Corvette models of this Vintage she does not leak in the rain whatsoever!Second owner that has well cared for it since purchased! The previous owner stated that this Corvette had originally been purchased brand new by another family member and has now stayed in the family for 34-Years. Clean CARFAX Report available and the previous owner's Documentation is also available for review when you the buyer inspect it.Few Specifications & Features include.-- Automatic transmission- 5.7 Liter V8 Crossfire Injection- Black with Slate-Grey Leather Interior- Power Windows & Door Locks- Power Driver's Seat- A Professionally Installed JVC AM.FM with Single-Disc CD Player (has Smartphone Plug-in capability - this replaced a non-working OEM unit)- Dual Exhaust- Front Fog Lights- Speed Control- Adjustable Steering Wheel- Variable Intermittent Wipers- Tachometer- 20.0 Gallons Fuel Tank Capacity- Front Bucket Seats- 4-Wheel Independent Suspension- Power Steering & Brakes- 2 sets of Targa Roof Panels - both OEM & Mirror Outside Panel (as shown in pictures)- Custom WheelsAnd much more...!Note. Has been CARFAX Documented - Clean title in hand!This is a must see American Classic and everything within works wellCurrently located in Plover WI.Serious inquiries only.Financing Nationwide Shipping and Warranties available to qualified buyers.
title: 1982 Chevrolet Corvette

description: You are looking at one of the finest examples of a 100% original C3 Corvette that you will find anywhere. It is a 1982 model with only 98,000 original CARFAX documented miles. It has been garage kept its whole life, and boasts original paint, original interior, and original removable glass t-tops. It is White and Silver with a Silver Leather Interior. The tires are excellent, the Air Conditioning work just like it should. The power windows and gauges all work just as they are supposed to, as does the stereo. It was just serviced at the local Chevy dealer. Remember: THEY ARE ONLY ORIGINAL ONCE.  ********************************************************************************** We support our troops! We give a $500 discount off of the listed asking price to active duty and retired US Military. All we need is a copy of your military ID card or a copy of your DD-214. Thank-you for defending our country!  Every time we sell a vehicle, we donate $10 to the Navy-Marine Corps Relief Society. The Society provides financial assistance and education, as well as other programs and services, to members of the United States Navy and Marine Corps, their eligible family members, widows, and survivors. **********************************************************************************  FREE CARFAX VEHICLE HISTORY REPORT AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. Our price is fair. Open to offers and trades... The only stupid question is the one you don't ask. CASH OR CERTIFIED CHECK ONLY. If you need financing, I may be able to help you with local lenders and Credit Unions. Call Matt at two-five-two, six-four-six, four-four-two-zero. We are located walking distance from the Morehead City Super Wal-Mart at 180 Harris Street (Behind Pier One Imports). Matt Hagen Motors LLC is Carteret County's ONLY indoor used car facility and offers our customers the opportunity to view vehicles inside, out of the weather, in a well lit environment. VEHICLES SHOWN BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. Visit our website at matthagenmotors.com

description: New Arrival...pictures coming soon! 1982 Corvette Collector Edition. Local trade with only 26,211 original miles. Coined to be the "The Corvette to Covet" options exclusive to the Collector Edition are Silver Beige Metallic Paint, Pinstripe and Fading Shadow, Bronze Color and Solar Screen T-Tops, Rear Window Defrost, Power Antenna, Special Wheels and Hubs, and a Newly Designed Fully Lifting Framed Hatchback. This all wraps around a matching Silver Beige Metallic Leather interior with multi-tone leather seats and door trim. The upgraded carpeting throughout and the theme colored, hand-sewn leather wrapped steering wheel and leather covered horn button which is surmounted by a cloisonne' emblem is also exclusive to the Collector Edition. These features are framed by the deeply muted dark beige console and instrument cluster trim plates. To ensure the uniqueness each one built displays special vehicle identification to prevent it from ever being "cloned". Production was limited to just 6,759 vehicles and was the first time in Corvette history the base price exceeded $20,000.00. The '82 Corvette was the last of a generation which dated its basic body structure to 1968 and its chassis to 1963. Please contact us prior to visiting our showroom. This vehicle is stored indoors and can be viewed by appointment only. For additional information and details or to schedule an appointment call or text Jereme at (989) 239-7535. www.adrenalinemotorsports.net

title: 1982 Chevrolet Corvette

description: This 1982 Collector Edition Corvette still has a hint of new car smell, and the eyes confirm what the nose knows. There's hardly a sign of wear in this 34 year old car with incredibly low average annual mileage. The seats are tight, the carpets are clean, and the car drives like it was new. You can almost hear Eye of the Tiger rocking through the speakers.    Less than 8,000 Collector Edition Corvettes were produced, and this is an incredible example in almost pure original condition. The 1982 Corvette was the last of a generation which dated its basic body structure to 1968 and its chassis to 1963. To honor the special status, Chevrolet offered a Collector Edition, which came standard with many optional features. This included lifting rear hatchback glass, a Corvette first, and exclusive to the Collector Edition. It also had special wheels styled to resemble 1967's bolt on optional wheels, unique silver-beige paint, silver-beige leather interior, and special cloisonne emblems.     Call Art & Speed today at (901) 850-0507, or fill out the contact form at right to inquire about making this magnificent specimen yours.
